import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import x from '../Assets/xicon.png'; const CartItems = () => { const {all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0) return

{e.name}

{e.price}

{removeFromCart}} />
})}
) } export default CartItems
